summary: All Jaxonz great mods in one package
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6][color=#F5C908][b]ALL JAXONZ' BEST, IN ONE MOD![/b][/color][/size]
[size=4]A Swiss army knife of all those great utility mods.[/size][/center]
By popular request, I have combined all of my utilities into a single mod for people with 255 mods installed.

[color=#F5C908][b]Jaxonz Utilities is intended ONLY for people fighting the 255 ESP limit. If you don't want everything that is in Jaxonz Utilities, just install the individual mods instead. Please don't install Jaxonz Utilities and then complain that it includes something that you don't want.[/b][/color]

Jaxonz Utilities includes all of these great mods!
[list]
[*][url=../52583]Jaxonz Positioner[/url]: The champion of object manipulation.
[*][url=../57335]Jaxonz Renamer[/url]: Rename anything in the game.
[*][url=../61430]Jaxonz Real Names[/url]: Automatically assign lore-friendly names to unnamed NPCs.
[*][url=../60718]Jaxonz Named Save[/url]: Save games with meaningful names.
[*][url=../52927]Jaxonz Smart Looter[/url]: Automatically grab the good stuff and leave the junk behind.
[*][url=../58450]Jaxonz Map Markers[/url]: Mark any person, place, or thing and find it on the map.
[*][url=../61431]Jaxonz Archery Util[/url]: Automatically switch to first person view when shooting, tracer shots, zero in sights.
[*][url=../57938]Jaxonz Protect Favorites[/url]: Prevent accidental dropping/selling/melting your favorited items.
[*][url=../55474]Jaxonz Lights Please[/url]: Makes magical lighting spells a ton easier.
[*][url=../58481]Jaxonz Zoom[/url]: Quickly zoom in or out in first person.
[*][url=../52864]Jaxonz Crafting Helper[/url]: Easily use ingredients stored near crafting stations.
[*][url=../57756]Jaxonz Droppable Statics[/url]: A store for placeable furnitishings. (WIP)
[*][url=../58451]Jaxonz SKSE Tester[/url]: Validate that SKSE and SkyUI are correctly installed.
[/list]

[size=5][color=#F5C908]Featured recently by Brodual[/color][/size]
[youtube]WHeG0wCkxE8[/youtube] [youtube]ffCIfSwcDxo[/youtube]
[center][url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://i.imgur.com/hXQSy.png[/img][/url][/center]
[color=#F5C908][heading]Requirements[/heading][/color]
[list]
[*][url=http://skse.silverlock.org]SKSE 1.7.1[/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/?]SkyUI[/url]
[/list]
[color=#F5C908][heading]Compatibility[/heading][/color]
[list]
[*]No DLC required.
[*]Fully compatible with DLC and 3rd party mods.
[*]All hotkeys can easily be remapped to avoid conflicts.
[*]Each constituent mod supports deactivation.
[*]There is a known conflict with some follower mods UFO/AFT/EFF/FM. Either install the patches from Renamer or just BASH merge.
[/list]
[color=#F5C908][heading]Instructions for Existing Jaxonz Users[/heading][/color]
[list]
[*]Just install this mod (preferably with NMM or MO) and disable/uninstall replaced Jaxonz mods.
[*]Your existing settings will be preserved per game.
[*]It is recommended to save your game and clean with [url=../52363]Save game script cleaner[/url] by Hadoram to purge any orphaned scripts/objects.
[*]This latest version removes Jaxonz MCM Kicker and Jaxonz Archery Focus from Jaxonz Utilities and adds Jaxonz Archery Util and Jaxonz Real Names.
[/list]
[color=#F5C908][heading]Version Information[/heading][/color]
JU is a compendium of known stable mods. I build it using TES5Edit. It contains the current version of each individual mod at the date of build.

IF you need to reduce ESPs AND must have the latest and greatest versions
THEN get individual mods and merge them yourself using [url=../37981]Merge Plugins xEdit Script[/url] with [url=../25859]TES5Edit[/url].
OTHERWISE, IF you need to reduce ESPs
THEN get Jaxonz Utilities
OTHERWISE
THEN just get the individual mods
[color=#F5C908][heading]Support[/heading][/color]
[list]
[*]Please use the Posts tab in for all support/comments/suggestions/complaints. Private messages will just be redirected here.
[*]General Utilities topics should use this mod, but please use the links above for support on individual mod functions.
[*]By posting publicly, everyone can help you and it helps help build information for others to use.
[*]Please read the first page or so of comments before posting your question. Chances are it has been asked and answered already.
[/list]

Check out [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/10674107/?tb=mods]Other Great Mods[/url] from Jaxonz[/heading][/color]

All Jaxonz mods are professionally coded for stability and high quality.
author: Jaxonz

files.name: Jaxonz Utilities
files.changelogHtml:
*Making sure individual utilities truly stop when disabled in Jaxonz Utilities MCM menu
*Enhanced projectile gathering in Smart Looter, effectively moving Collect Arrows from Jaxonz Archery Perks
*Replaced Archery Focus with Archery Util; this combines existing Archery Focus and Tracer Shots from Jaxonz Archery Perks. Additional features to Archery Focus include options to return to 3rd person on bow sheath or when hit with melee weapon. Hotkey toggle also provided for enabling Tracer Shots.
*Added automatic option to Crafting Helper, which seems to work _most_ of the time to automatically load resources from nearby containers when you engage a crafting station. Some challenges with Grinding Wheels I haven't resolved yet.
*Added experimental code to Protect Favorites to provide protection at smelter... so far not working to my satisfaction.
*Removed modifications to Skyrim FollowerDialogue quest for Renamer, which allowed renaming of followers but seem to conflict with AFT, UFO, and Follower Mod. Will provide as an optional patch and also engage with authors of those mods to incorporate the same changes, resolving conflicts.
*Redesigned SKSE tester, ensuring that it only pops up if issues are detected by default.

files.name: Jaxonz Utilities
files.changelogHtml:
Updated Archery Util, providing more options for tracer shots.
Updated Smart Looter, providing greater protection against breaking quests by automatically looting quest items. Should also work with DLC and third party content quests.

files.name: Jaxonz Utilities
files.changelogHtml: Fixed packaging problem by adding correct version of JaxonzConsolePlugin.DLL to archive.

files.name: Jaxonz Utilities
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed omission of Crafting Helper.
Corrected missing MCM menu for Droppable Statics.
Inclusion of all updates to all constituent mods.
